verbs.description: slow - cooker [ARGM-MNR: cordon] [V: bleu] soup i 've taken this creamy slow cooker soup to potlucks and teacher luncheons and i bring home an empty crock every time when my son school recently created a cookbook this was the first recipe he asked me to submit and his teachers were glad he did —erica winkel ada michigan cook soup
